# Research Computational<br>DS at CHOC

## About Our Presenter

[Quinn Gates](https://www.linkedin.com/in/quinn-gates-d/) is a Research Computational Data Scientist at CHOC Children's Hospital. On the RCS team, he specializes in Machine Learning, Image Analysis, and Data Services.

He is a Chapman University graduate where he received a Bachelors Degree in Mathematics and a Masters Degree in Computational and Data Sciences.

Quinn loves using his abilities and his education to serve his community.
